string-array.name: demos
string-array.item: Dinja Bomb\n\nA texturized dinja bomb object controlled with a TiltForceInputController. Also demonstrates the loading of X3D files.
World Sphere\n\nA texturized world sphere controlled with a FingerMovementController. Also demonstrates how to use the debug view.
Dancing Letters\n\nSome dancing letters with an alpha channel. Demonstrates the use of animators and animator scripts.

Rubiks Cube\n\nA rubiks cube that can be rotated and manipulated. The demo begins with a completed cube with sections that can be rotated using fling movements. Demonstrates the use of a FingerDeltaMovementInputController together with other parts of the engine, such as node groups, scene graph manipulation, animator listeners and programatically configured texture coordinates.
